main event: An elderly lady reported observing an oblong bluish-white light hovering at a low altitude near Gary, Indiana on October 3, 1960.
interesting points: The light was described as being about the size of a basketball.,The light appeared to move slowly at a slight angle before disappearing.,No sound was heard during the sighting.,The light reportedly appeared and disappeared several times during the observation.,The case has been marked as a valid sighting of an unknown aerial phenomenon that warrants further investigation.
